Name: ShipGift-Shark
Text: The deep sea research team on your home planet has created a new ship class for you

Name: Stellar-MeteorShower
Text: A meteor shower came down over {0}. You received {1} metal but unfortunately {2} of your population died.

Name: Stellar-SuperNova
Text: The sun {0} turned to a super nova. All planets in this system were vaporized.

Name: TechnologyGift-Bioship
Text: A genetic researcher figured out a path to create biological ships in space. You are now able to build bioships.

Name: TechnologyGift-Terraforming
Text: A scientist discovered that it is possible to terraform planets.

Name: Society-HappyTaxPayers
Text: Happy tax payers brought in more money this year.

Name: Society-Riot
Text: A riot occured on {0}. You lost {1} of your population.

Name: Society-BabyBoom
Text: A baby boom occured on {0}. Welcome your new citizens.

Name: TechnologyGift-Advance-Attack
Text: A crazy scientist discovered how to dramatically increase your attack capabilities.

Name: TechnologyGift-Advance-Defense
Text: Another crazy scientist discovered how to better defend himself. Your defense capabilities increased.

Name: TechnologyGift-Advance-Speed
Text: Prof. Dr. Gonzalez, yes the son, discovered how to improve the speed of your ships dramatically.

Name: TechnologyGift-Advance-Range
Text: Ethopian scientists discovered how your ships can travel much further.

Name: Technology-StealTechnology
Text: You stole a technology from {0}. You are now able to {1}.
